Title: Duplicate Advisory: Insecure Temporary File in RESTEasy
Description:
# Duplicate Advisory
This advisory has been withdrawn because it is a duplicate of GHSA-2c6g-pfx3-w7h8. This link is maintained to preserve external references.

# Original Description
In RESTEasy the insecure File.createTempFile() is used in the DataSourceProvider, FileProvider and Mime4JWorkaround classes which creates temp files with insecure permissions that could be read by a local user.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 5.0.0.Alpha1 before 5.0.6.Final, all versions starting from 6.0.0.Beta1 before 6.2.3.Final, all versions before 4.7.8.Final
NotImpacted: All versions before 5.0.0.Alpha1, all versions starting from 5.0.6.Final before 6.0.0.Beta1, all versions starting from 6.2.3.Final before 0, all versions starting from 4.7.8.Final
